desc: Healthy Grab N’ Go chickpeas that are cooked and sealed fresh, 100% natural and shelf stable. Tender never dry. Flavorful. Protein, Iron, Zinc rich. Nutrient dense.

layout.text: Slow-Cooked, Tender, and Never Dry. Absolutely Delicious.

An innovative and intensely flavorful line of Healthy Grab N’ Go chickpeas that are cooked and sealed fresh, 100% natural and shelf stable. Halvana’s snacks are changing the game, and your whole vibe. Get ready for a fresh, healthy snacking experience made specifically for on-the-go folks like you – no fridge, no preservatives, no worries.
